channel.description: Professional timing belt replacement for Peugeot 208 PureTech engines in South-East London.

item.g:title: Peugeot 208 1.0/1.2 PureTech Timing Belt Replacement
item.g:description: All-inclusive timing belt replacement for Peugeot 208 1.0 and 1.2 PureTech engines in South-East London (Plumstead). Includes timing belt kit, crankshaft bolt, oil and filters, rocker cover gasket, sump and strainer cleaning, VVT solenoids cleaning, diagnostics and minor improvements.
